S.FORM: == Fa-tuo-muo-na 筏馱摩那 == ngangan名稱 nisulitan i Fuo-cin tu ci Ni-kan-zuo-ti-ce, Ni-kan-tuo-ti-ce " hu-yi, Nirgrantha-jñāniputra, pa-li-yi Nigaṇṭha-nāṭaputta, In-tu kamu Niggaṃtha-nāyaputta", atu Ni-kan-ce. Ni-kan u kiwkay nida a ngangan, u li-si, w-si pangangan han u Zuo-ti-ce, tungus u Zuo-ti-secu "Jñāta, sipunuay" nilecuhan. Fa-tuo-muo-na naw Ni-kan-tuo-pay a bungsang, nikudan u ke-sin-ciaw-yi, mapatideng tu Ci-na-ciaw. :Nirgrantha-jñāniputra,巴利語:Nigaṇṭha-nāṭaputta,印度俗語:Niggaṃtha-nāyaputta), (Jñāta,智慧)出身. . kaudipan生平 Fa-tuo-muo-na a pilecuhan, yadah ku sananay a musakamu, tulu ku kakatinengan nu katuuday, pasu aydaay a Wa-yi-sa-li kin, Pi-ha-e-pan-cia-mu-yi, atu u Wan-se'-cen micapiay a Na-lan-tuo. duma Pi-ha-e-pan-cia-mu-yi u caynem kanatalan tawya culil tu matenesay a suo-tu Cun-se mibatad tu 45 kunli a Kung-de-cun. Fa-tuo-muo-na atu Se-cia-muo-ni malecad, u niyadu'ay nu tahuda a wawa, i kapahayay nu lumaan a maudip, ci ama nida u pacakayay tu tebus nu wancaw a Sa-ti-li, ngangan u Siddhartha, wina u Li-ce niyadu'ay a kuncu, ci Trishala. tulu a bataan ku mihcaan ni Fa-tuo-muo-na alesen nida ku zaysan nu luma', luma' " idaw ku acawa nida atu tataynaan a wawa" wicakuyca kapah ku liklik nu luma', paytem milaliw mikilim tu tatengaay a cudadan, mikilim tu hahanhanan a nipaelihan. nikudan nu sabaw tusa nu pankiwan, milauyd ci nida tu namakabalucuay a nisimsiman atu namaka labuay a nikatadikudan, sakikuday matineng tu ci nida tu kawaw " Kevala Jñāna", u sadikuday tu a nadatengan. ,名為Siddhartha, Trishala. (Kevala Jñāna),也就是最終的啟示. tu nikudan, cukaymasen nida ku sadikuday a nikaudip tu tulu a bataan nu nikaudipan nida tacuwacuwa musakamu tu sakatinengaw nu sakaytademaw, mamin tu culilan ku In-tu, pahetik tu nakamuan nida tu Ce-sye, mibelih tu Ceung nu kawawan, patideng tu sakakapah, mibelih tu sakayedes, caay pipatay tu tuud, caay palemang sa musakamu, caay piubi, caay pilebu tu tawan atu caay piwawies a lima ku nipatudu tu pabaway a sasakamuen. Fa-tuo-muo-na saan, sipakayda i nabalucuan atu nikadatengan nu udip mapanengil a tademaw, u nuheni u ci-na "jina", u talakaway, sa Ci-na-ciaw. 之後, . Fa-tuo-muo-na itida i Puo-puoe-cen " Pāvā, ayda ay a Puo-puoe-pu-li-cen" mapatay, kaudipan makaala tu pitu a bataan idaw ku tusa, salacay nu dikucan saan itida ci nida i kun-yun nu ayawan tu limtu pic mihcaan mapatay, u ten-yi-pay saan u kunyun nu ayawan tu sipnem wal mihcaan. ci-na ciaw nu cudadan sakamusa ci nidaan tu nikapatayan caay namin kalecad, idaw ku musakamuay tu madayumay a sasakamuen, idaw ku sananay tu katuuday nu di'tuan atu kuo-wan milab utu tabakiay a lisinana. sakamusa jinasena a " Mahapurana", tayni milihida ku tapukuan a tademaw tu nipitademan nida. tin-yi-pay dayday a " Pravachanasara" kamu, kapatayan nida u kanus atu bukes ku liwan nida, udip nida mahida u dakes malabali. idaw ku nacudadan saan, ci Fa-tuo-muo-na pitu a bataan idaw ku tusa nu mihcaan nida sa, i enemay a demiadan misuayaw tu katuuday musakamu, mabi' namin ku katuuday , nengil sa nai' tu ci nida " u kanus atu bukes ku liwan, u mikilulay tu ci nidaan a tademawan tuduh hantu". 筏馱摩那在波婆城(Pāvā, . 根據Jinasena的"Mahapurana", "Pravachanasara"說, . Sen-fa-tuo-muo-na yadah ku mikilulay ci nidaan, matinengay sabaw tu cacay, kapatayan satu, u In-de-la-pu-ti " Indrabhūti" atu Su-ta-muo "Sudharma" mitulinay midintu. (Indrabhūti)與蘇達摩(Sudharma)繼續傳道. cudadan nu Fuo-ciaw佛教記載 " cuo-a-han-cin. ni-kan-cin" nisulitan nida a su'-cuo-in-sye-suo, pasubana u ngelu' ku sapilawpes tu malumanay a kawawan, amica acaay picunus tu baluhay, anu kapah ku kawaw taneng miales, " mahida u ni-kan sa" ,mahida hinaadih, mahida hinasakamu, saan , caay kaw kakabiluan, idaw namin ku pisakawawan. anu idaw ku malumanay a kawawan, nikangelu'an lawpesatu, caay pisabaluhay tu kawaw, nai' tu ku laheci, anu nai' tu ku kawaw, mapatay nu ngelu', anu caay ka ngelu', halhal hank u ngelu'. " . "tawya, ci Se-li-ce, pasayda ci Ni-cin-tuo-sen-zuo-di-ce kitidaan, u salengacay sakamusa, saydan, uycanan ku zen-suo-cun-fali? hican mitulun ku mikilulay? sademiad han micuda a idaw tu ku'puc? patubeli ci Pi-se, " tay-ce, aku tu kaku sa, nisakakawawan mahida nikaadihan, mahida nakamuan, anu mahida ku tademaw, makaadih tu nikangelu'an a kawawan, sipakayda i tuas a nisakakawawan, u mangelu'ay ku kawaw, taneng milawpes tu kawaw, acaay pisabaluhay sikawaw, kinapataysa, nai' ku matinengay, hatida tu, mapatay tu, mapatay tu nu ngulu'."

== Fa-too-moo-na 筏馱摩那 == ngangan名稱 nisolitan i Foo-cin to ci Ni-kan-zoo-ti-ce, Ni-kan-too-ti-ce " ho-yi, Nirgrantha-jñānipotra, pa-li-yi Nigaṇṭha-nāṭapotta, In-to kamo Niggaṃtha-nāyapotta", ato Ni-kan-ce. Ni-kan o kiwkay nida a ngangan, o li-si, w-si pangangan han o Zoo-ti-ce, tongos o Zoo-ti-seco "Jñāta, siponoay" nilecohan. Fa-too-moo-na naw Ni-kan-too-pay a bongsang, nikodan o ke-sin-ciaw-yi, mapatideng to Ci-na-ciaw. :Nirgrantha-jñānipotra,巴利語:Nigaṇṭha-nāṭapotta,印度俗語:Niggaṃtha-nāyapotta), (Jñāta,智慧)出身. . kaodipan生平 Fa-too-moo-na a pilecohan, yadah ko sananay a mosakamo, tolo ko kakatinengan no katooday, paso aydaay a Wa-yi-sa-li kin, Pi-ha-e-pan-cia-mo-yi, ato o Wan-se'-cen micapiay a Na-lan-too. doma Pi-ha-e-pan-cia-mo-yi o caynem kanatalan tawya colil to matenesay a soo-to Con-se mibatad to 45 konli a Kong-de-con. Fa-too-moo-na ato Se-cia-moo-ni malecad, o niyado'ay no tahoda a wawa, i kapahayay no lomaan a maodip, ci ama nida o pacakayay to tebos no wancaw a Sa-ti-li, ngangan o Siddhartha, wina o Li-ce niyado'ay a konco, ci Trishala. tolo a bataan ko mihcaan ni Fa-too-moo-na alesen nida ko zaysan no loma', loma' " idaw ko acawa nida ato tataynaan a wawa" wicakoyca kapah ko liklik no loma', paytem milaliw mikilim to tatengaay a codadan, mikilim to hahanhanan a nipaelihan. nikodan no sabaw tosa no pankiwan, milaoyd ci nida to namakabalocoay a nisimsiman ato namaka laboay a nikatadikodan, sakikoday matineng to ci nida to kawaw " Kevala Jñāna", o sadikoday to a nadatengan. ,名為Siddhartha, Trishala. (Kevala Jñāna),也就是最終的啟示. to nikodan, cokaymasen nida ko sadikoday a nikaodip to tolo a bataan no nikaodipan nida tacowacowa mosakamo to sakatinengaw no sakaytademaw, mamin to colilan ko In-to, pahetik to nakamoan nida to Ce-sye, mibelih to Ceong no kawawan, patideng to sakakapah, mibelih to sakayedes, caay pipatay to tood, caay palemang sa mosakamo, caay piobi, caay pilebo to tawan ato caay piwawies a lima ko nipatodo to pabaway a sasakamoen. Fa-too-moo-na saan, sipakayda i nabalocoan ato nikadatengan no odip mapanengil a tademaw, o noheni o ci-na "jina", o talakaway, sa Ci-na-ciaw. 之後, . Fa-too-moo-na itida i Poo-pooe-cen " Pāvā, ayda ay a Poo-pooe-po-li-cen" mapatay, kaodipan makaala to pito a bataan idaw ko tosa, salacay no dikocan saan itida ci nida i kon-yon no ayawan to limto pic mihcaan mapatay, o ten-yi-pay saan o konyon no ayawan to sipnem wal mihcaan. ci-na ciaw no codadan sakamosa ci nidaan to nikapatayan caay namin kalecad, idaw ko mosakamoay to madayomay a sasakamoen, idaw ko sananay to katooday no di'toan ato koo-wan milab oto tabakiay a lisinana. sakamosa jinasena a " Mahaporana", tayni milihida ko tapokoan a tademaw to nipitademan nida. tin-yi-pay dayday a " Pravachanasara" kamo, kapatayan nida o kanos ato bokes ko liwan nida, odip nida mahida o dakes malabali. idaw ko nacodadan saan, ci Fa-too-moo-na pito a bataan idaw ko tosa no mihcaan nida sa, i enemay a demiadan misoayaw to katooday mosakamo, mabi' namin ko katooday , nengil sa nai' to ci nida " o kanos ato bokes ko liwan, o mikilolay to ci nidaan a tademawan todoh hanto". 筏馱摩那在波婆城(Pāvā, . 根據Jinasena的"Mahaporana", "Pravachanasara"說, . Sen-fa-too-moo-na yadah ko mikilolay ci nidaan, matinengay sabaw to cacay, kapatayan sato, o In-de-la-po-ti " Indrabhūti" ato So-ta-moo "Sodharma" mitolinay midinto. (Indrabhūti)與蘇達摩(Sodharma)繼續傳道. codadan no Foo-ciaw佛教記載 " coo-a-han-cin. ni-kan-cin" nisolitan nida a so'-coo-in-sye-soo, pasobana o ngelo' ko sapilawpes to malomanay a kawawan, amica acaay piconos to balohay, ano kapah ko kawaw taneng miales, " mahida o ni-kan sa" ,mahida hinaadih, mahida hinasakamo, saan , caay kaw kakabiloan, idaw namin ko pisakawawan. ano idaw ko malomanay a kawawan, nikangelo'an lawpesato, caay pisabalohay to kawaw, nai' to ko laheci, ano nai' to ko kawaw, mapatay no ngelo', ano caay ka ngelo', halhal hank o ngelo'. " . "tawya, ci Se-li-ce, pasayda ci Ni-cin-too-sen-zoo-di-ce kitidaan, o salengacay sakamosa, saydan, oycanan ko zen-soo-con-fali? hican mitolon ko mikilolay? sademiad han micoda a idaw to ko'poc? patobeli ci Pi-se, " tay-ce, ako to kako sa, nisakakawawan mahida nikaadihan, mahida nakamoan, ano mahida ko tademaw, makaadih to nikangelo'an a kawawan, sipakayda i toas a nisakakawawan, o mangelo'ay ko kawaw, taneng milawpes to kawaw, acaay pisabalohay sikawaw, kinapataysa, nai' ko matinengay, hatida to, mapatay to, mapatay to no ngolo'."
